solution_line_template: Eunice can plant a total of {num_pots_filled_initially} pots x {seeds_per_pot} seeds = <<{num_pots_filled_initially}*{seeds_per_pot}={total_seeds_in_three_pots}>>{total_seeds_in_three_pots} seeds in three pots.

So, only {total_seeds_eunice_has} - {total_seeds_in_three_pots} = <<{total_seeds_eunice_has}-{total_seeds_in_three_pots}={remaining_seeds}>>{remaining_seeds} eggplant seed will be planted in the fourth pot.
